message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.DS 

The paper proposes a method for constructing the Error Correcting Output Code for multi-class classification. This technique is commonly used in machine learning, which falls under the category of Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI). The paper also discusses the performance of the proposed method in terms of accuracy and classification times, which are important aspects of machine learning algorithms. The use of the minimum weight perfect matching algorithm is a common technique in graph theory, which is relevant to Computer Science (cs) as a whole. The paper also mentions the use of binary classifiers, which are commonly used in Computer Vision (cs.CV) and Natural Language Processing (cs.CL). Finally, the paper discusses the generalization performance of the proposed method, which is a key aspect of Data Science (cs.DS).
